segments.date.description: The date related to the user location view data.

customer.currency_code.description: The currency code used by the customer.

customer.descriptive_name.description: The descriptive name of the customer.

customer.time_zone.description: The time zone set for the customer.

user_location_view.targeting_location.description: The targeted location for the user location view.

user_location_view.resource_name.description: The resource name associated with the user location view.

campaign.base_campaign.description: The base campaign information tied to the user location view data.

campaign.id.description: The ID of the campaign linked to the user location view data.

campaign.name.description: The name of the campaign associated with the user location view data.

campaign.status.description: The status of the campaign related to the user location view data.

ad_group.status.description: The status of the ad group related to the user location view data.

ad_group.base_ad_group.description: The base ad group information related to the user location view data.

metrics.all_conversions.description: Total number of conversions for all actions.

metrics.all_conversions_from_interaction.description: The rate of all conversions from interactions.

metrics.all_conversions_value.description: The total value of all conversions.

metrics.average_cost.description: The average cost of all clicks.

metrics.average_cpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions.

metrics.conversions_from_interactions_ra.description: The rate of conversions from interactions.

metrics.cost_micros.description: The cost in micros (millionths of the currency).

metrics.impressions.description: Total number of times the ad was shown.
